Sustainability & Environmental Practices.question: What sustainable or environmental practices have been implemented?
Sustainability & Environmental Practices.result: The text mentions Greenpeace's efforts to ban asbestos in Colombia due to its harmful effects on human health. Although the specific sustainable or environmental practices related to this issue are not directly mentioned, it can be inferred that promoting eco-friendly alternatives to asbestos could contribute to a more sustainable future. Additionally, raising awareness about the dangers of asbestos and advocating for safer working conditions can help reduce negative impacts on both human health and the environment.

source.content: necesitas valor para saltar al vacío necesitas mucho valor para dejar de ser parte de algo grande y dedicarte a luchar para convertirte en algo mejor Goodfellas es nuestro grito de independencia Queremos darle efectividad creatividad y frescura a nuestros clientes queremos sorprenderlos y demostrarles que la publicidad volvió a ser divertida y emocionanteSomos una agencia nueva pero con más de 30 años de experiencia nos gustan los problemas Como a los problemas no les importan los medios sino las soluciones a nosotros también Así que somos unos cuantos que hacen mucho atl btl digital estrategia marketing directo branding contenido propósito de marca microinfluencia lo que la idea y el sentido común indiquen que es lo más apropiado  — Calle 85  11 - 53 int 6 - 4 piso— Bogotá Colombia— PBX   Para más información o unirte a la agencia —

El día más felizy el más duro de una madre En el mundo de la cirugía plástica todos los procedimientos llevan nombres que hablan de succionar cortar quitar Pero cuando un cirujano ha creado un procedimiento capaz no solo de eso sino también de tonificar necesita salirse de la norma El cirujano Alfredo Hoyos quería hacer de su técnica patentada una marca para sus pacientes y para los médicos que quieren aprenderla Esta marca se creó con eso en mente Su nombre nace de lo que ellos mejor hacen para empujar a una empresa a la innovación las preguntas correctas Su logo y expresión gráfica están pensados para que vivan en su entregable más importante una presentación Para los médicos se creó una marca que refleja la habilidad que desarrollan gracias a la técnica Si el procedimiento se trata de definir los músculos en cualquier parte del cuerpo el título que llevan debería hacer honor a esto El día más felizy el más duro de una madre — Calle 85  11 - 53 int 6 - 4 piso— Bogotá Colombia— PBX

If you are reading this it is because your browser does not support the HTML5 video element Asbesto is a fibre which causes cancer is prohibited in more than 60 countries and has been responsible for many deaths in Colombia Despite this it is legal to use asbestos in Colombia and there are several companies whose products are made with the material However the most concerning aspect is that these products are exported but in other countries the asbestos is replaced with other non-harmful materials and the malignant product remains in the Colombian marketGreenpeace decided to take up the fight against asbestos and create a movement so that the companies would stop using the material in the production of their products They also lobbied for a law to be passed to outlaw asbestos which until that point had been rejected in its first hearing on 7 occasions To be successful in this struggle we changed the rules of the game leaving asbestos to one side as not many people understood the term

that point had been rejected in its first hearing on 7 occasions To be successful in this struggle we changed the rules of the game leaving asbestos to one side as not many people understood the term and it didn’t bring about any emotion in society We would speak instead about cancer and our story would be told by those who understood it best the survivors  This is the first success story to tell in the 7-year fight and the first time that 4 Government Ministers society and various important personalities came together to demand that the politicians put a stop to deaths caused by asbestos This is the first time that the proposed law passed in the first instance and it has become national news as well as a priority for the Government - Calle 85 11 - th floor— Bogotá Colombia— PBX

Sustainability & Environmental Practices.question: Are there any events or initiatives focused on environmental conservation? If yet then list 10 such events.
Sustainability & Environmental Practices.result: Based on the provided information, I cannot provide a specific list of 10 events or initiatives focused on environmental conservation. However, I can mention that the text mentions the importance of preserving nature through the brand Verdissimo, which focuses on preserved flowers and nature. Additionally, the project implemented in three zones in Bogotá emphasizes the importance of culture generation and sustainability. These aspects suggest that environmental conservation might be an underlying theme in some of the projects mentioned.

source.content: There are parts of Bogotá which are full of shopping malls and some blocks lack identity A project will be implemented in three of these such areas and even though they don’t appear to have much in common are going to co-exist a school offices and convention halls When we were asked to come up with a name and image for the project it seemed like a tough ask to bring so many elements together as part of a single project We realised however that they did have something in common culture generation Culture through education a business tower focused on cultural companies and in place of convention halls the creation of a cultural center More than creating a brand we had the opportunity to give a new identity to a zone in the city which had never previously been associated with culture That's why its name isn’t taken from the names of the owners of the land nor from the neighbourhood it’s in The name is an acronym of two words that we want it to be identified by Culture + Bogotá - Calle 85

that point had been rejected in its first hearing on 7 occasions To be successful in this struggle we changed the rules of the game leaving asbestos to one side as not many people understood the term and it didn’t bring about any emotion in society We would speak instead about cancer and our story would be told by those who understood it best the survivors  This is the first success story to tell in the 7-year fight and the first time that 4 Government Ministers society and various important personalities came together to demand that the politicians put a stop to deaths caused by asbestos This is the first time that the proposed law passed in the first instance and it has become national news as well as a priority for the Government - Calle 85 11 - th floor— Bogotá Colombia— PBX

The Colombian Amazon is known for its magic legend incredible natural beauty but less in terms of sophistication How did we respond to the challenge to create an international brand for Numaé Hello in the local dialect which offers typical Amazonian dishes and has a wild cat as its symbol By making the tribal language more sophisticated - Calle 85 11 - th floor— Bogotá Colombia— PBX

In a category loaded with floral romanticism and clichés where logos are often based on silhouettes of trees abstractions of leaves and heart-shaped roses; we needed to reinvent a brand Verdissimo exists to sell just that preserved flowers and nature How could we create a brand which flourishes in the category without being lost within it We started off by thinking about what they do preserving nature but we chose to understand differently Verdissimo doesn’t let time affect them They make sure that we can always see flowers in their best days In their youth Just like a photo that immortalizes a moment that we want to keep intact forever That's why there could be no other inspiration for reinventing Verdissimo's image than a photograph It couldn’t be any other promise for this new brand Forever young - Calle 85 11 - th floor— Bogotá Colombia— PBX

If you are reading this it is because your browser does not support the HTML5 video element Seguros Falabella/Falabella Insurance launched an App for their clients to be able to do whatever they want The majority of people however have negative perceptions of insurance companies as they feel that they’re a waste of time and no more than an obligation and an unnecessary expense If someone doesn’t want insurance Why would they want an App for it Faced with this scenario we decided to take risks and make Seguros Falabella/Falabella Insurance the first insurer in the world to openly accept that it wastes customers’ time but also the first insurer that decided to give it back to them - Calle 85 11 - th floor— Bogotá Colombia— PBX

source.content: Each and every child is amazing but society has divided them according to their realities the way in which they see the world and where they grow up defines their dreams and their futureCoschool was born to unite what society divided bringing all types of children together so that they can feel think and act without thinking about where they come from and that means kids can leave the bubble they live in discover a world that they never knew existed To construct an image for them we converted letters into unrelated symbols but on joining them together they created a flag so that just like the kids they are different but are able to bond togetherThrough these symbols we created a system and a uniform which allowed them to change their clothes and become equal because when kids meet and realise that they’re all the same and forget their different realities that’s when they grow together and create a better world - Calle 85 11 - th floor— Bogotá Colombia— PBX

El día más felizy el más duro de una madre En un lugar de Bogotá lleno de centros comerciales hay unas cuadras que no tienen identidad En este lugar se levantará un proyecto en el que tres áreas que aparentemente no tienen mucho en común van a convivir un colegio unas oficinas y unas salas de convenciones Cuando nos pidieron crear su nombre e imagen parecía una tarea difícil unir tantos elementos en un mismo proyecto Pero había algo que todos tenían en común generación de cultura Cultura desde la educación una torre empresarial enfocada en las compañías culturales y en lugar de salas de convenciones la creación de un centro cultural Más que crear una marca teníamos la oportunidad de darle una nueva identidad a una zona de la ciudad que nunca ha sido asociada a la cultura Por eso su nombre no hereda apellidos de los dueños del terreno ni del barrio en el que queda Nace del acrónimo de las dos palabras con las queremos que se identifique cultura + Bogotá El día más felizy el más duro de

El día más felizy el más duro de una madre Todos los niños son maravillosos pero la sociedad los dividió según sus realidades la forma en que se ven y el lugar donde viven definen sus sueños y su futuroCoschool nace para unir lo que la sociedad dividió uniendo niños de todo tipo para que puedan sentir pensar y actuar sin importar su origen así muchos niños salen de la burbuja en que viven y otros descubren un mundo que antes no existía Para construir su imagen convertimos letras en símbolos que no tienen ninguna relación pero que al unirse forman una bandera al igual que los niños los símbolos son distintos pero capaces de vivir juntosA partir de estos símbolos creamos todo un sistema y un uniforme que les permitía cambiar sus ropas y volverse pares porque cuando los niños se juntan se dan cuenta que todos son iguales y olvidan sus realidades cuando se juntan crecen juntos y crean un mundo mejor El día más felizy el más duro de una madre — Calle 85  11 - 53 int 6 - 4 piso— Bogotá

Employment & Opportunities.question: What employee or participant benefits are highlighted?
Employment & Opportunities.result:
The text mentions several types of benefits that employees or participants might receive from working with Seguros Falabella/Falabella Insurance through its app. These include:

1. Time-saving: By using the app, clients can save time usually spent on lengthy paperwork and phone calls when dealing with traditional insurance providers.
2. Transparency: The company acknowledges that insurance can seem like a waste of time, but they aim to give customers their time back by being transparent about how they use it.
3. Fun and excitement: Goodfellas, an agency associated with Seguros Falabella/Falabella Insurance, emphasizes making advertising enjoyable and engaging once again. This may lead to increased job satisfaction among employees involved in creating these campaigns.
4. Problem-solving: As a relatively new agency with over 30 years of experience, Goodfellas prides itself on tackling complex challenges. Employees who contribute to successful solutions may benefit from personal growth and recognition within the organization.
5. Holiday celebrations: Apple requested Seguros Falabella/Falabella Insurance to create a commercial for Mother's Day, demonstrating the company's willingness to participate in cultural events and holidays. This may foster a sense of community and shared experiences among employees.

source.content: If you are reading this it is because your browser does not support the HTML5 video element Seguros Falabella/Falabella Insurance launched an App for their clients to be able to do whatever they want The majority of people however have negative perceptions of insurance companies as they feel that they’re a waste of time and no more than an obligation and an unnecessary expense If someone doesn’t want insurance Why would they want an App for it Faced with this scenario we decided to take risks and make Seguros Falabella/Falabella Insurance the first insurer in the world to openly accept that it wastes customers’ time but also the first insurer that decided to give it back to them - Calle 85 11 - th floor— Bogotá Colombia— PBX

Apple asked us to create a commercial for Mother’s Day and we have to admit that it was a challenge as it’s so easy to fall into the typical clichés and we wanted to find a real story which could touch all those who saw it That’s why we decided to show the two sides of motherhood not only the happiness that comes with a new arrival to the family but also the sadness that comes with maternity leave coming to an end - Calle 85 11 - th floor— Bogotá Colombia— PBX

Research & Innovation.question: What are the latest publications, research findings, or introduced technologies?
Research & Innovation.result: Based on the provided information, it seems that there is no specific publication, research finding, or introduced technology mentioned in the text. However, we can infer that Dr. Alfredo Hoyos has developed a unique and patented surgical procedure for body contouring and muscle definition. This procedure is designed to not only remove excess fat but also to tighten and tone the targeted areas. The goal was to create a successful business venture by developing a recognizable brand name for both patients and medical professionals who want to learn this advanced technique. To achieve this, they created a strong visual identity with a logo and graphic design that reflects the innovative nature of their work. Additionally, the text mentions that the agency values problem-solving and has over 30 years of combined experience among its team members. They specialize in providing effective, creative, and fresh advertising solutions for their clients, aiming to surprise and demonstrate that advertising can be fun and emotional again.

Research & Innovation.question: Are there any ongoing or upcoming research projects or innovation initiatives? If yes then list them
Research & Innovation.result: Based on the provided information about Calle 85, I cannot find any specific mention of ongoing or upcoming research projects or innovation initiatives related to this project. However, it can be inferred that the project itself involves bringing together various elements (school, offices, and a cultural center) under one umbrella, which could potentially lead to future collaborations or joint ventures aimed at fostering cultural growth and development within the community.

source.content: There are parts of Bogotá which are full of shopping malls and some blocks lack identity A project will be implemented in three of these such areas and even though they don’t appear to have much in common are going to co-exist a school offices and convention halls When we were asked to come up with a name and image for the project it seemed like a tough ask to bring so many elements together as part of a single project We realised however that they did have something in common culture generation Culture through education a business tower focused on cultural companies and in place of convention halls the creation of a cultural center More than creating a brand we had the opportunity to give a new identity to a zone in the city which had never previously been associated with culture That's why its name isn’t taken from the names of the owners of the land nor from the neighbourhood it’s in The name is an acronym of two words that we want it to be identified by Culture + Bogotá - Calle 85

source.content: There are parts of Bogotá which are full of shopping malls and some blocks lack identity A project will be implemented in three of these such areas and even though they don’t appear to have much in common are going to co-exist a school offices and convention halls When we were asked to come up with a name and image for the project it seemed like a tough ask to bring so many elements together as part of a single project We realised however that they did have something in common culture generation Culture through education a business tower focused on cultural companies and in place of convention halls the creation of a cultural center More than creating a brand we had the opportunity to give a new identity to a zone in the city which had never previously been associated with culture That's why its name isn’t taken from the names of the owners of the land nor from the neighbourhood it’s in The name is an acronym of two words that we want it to be identified by Culture + Bogotá - Calle 85

Each and every child is amazing but society has divided them according to their realities the way in which they see the world and where they grow up defines their dreams and their futureCoschool was born to unite what society divided bringing all types of children together so that they can feel think and act without thinking about where they come from and that means kids can leave the bubble they live in discover a world that they never knew existed To construct an image for them we converted letters into unrelated symbols but on joining them together they created a flag so that just like the kids they are different but are able to bond togetherThrough these symbols we created a system and a uniform which allowed them to change their clothes and become equal because when kids meet and realise that they’re all the same and forget their different realities that’s when they grow together and create a better world - Calle 85 11 - th floor— Bogotá Colombia— PBX

Collaboration & Partnerships.question: What are the mutual objectives and outcomes expected from these collaborations?
Collaboration & Partnerships.result:
Collaborating across various sectors (culture, education, business), the projects aim to achieve several shared goals and outcomes. These include:

1. Fostering cultural exchange and understanding between diverse groups within the community.
2. Promoting educational opportunities and accessibility for individuals from varying backgrounds.
3. Encouraging innovation and creativity in both business practices and problem-solving strategies.
4. Strengthening social connections and unity among people from diverse walks of life.
5. Enhancing the overall quality of life for residents in the affected neighborhoods.
6. Contributing to the development of a more vibrant, inclusive, and culturally rich urban environment in Bogotá.
